alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Fayette (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 12:58PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fayette and Coweta Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1258 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Arnco-Sargent, or near Newnan, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Newnan, Fayetteville, Peachtree City, Tyrone, Senoia, Whitesburg, Brooks, Moreland, Sharpsburg, Turin, Woolsey, East Newnan, Plant Yates, Starrs Mill, Arnco-Sargent, Inman, Dunaway Gardens, Cannongate, Lake Horton, and Roscoe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
